mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE menu_tree AS ( SELECT id, name, parent_id,path,perms,component,type,icon,orderNum,create_time,update_time,`status`,1 AS level FROM sys_menu WHERE parent_id=0 UNION ALL SELECT m.id, m.name, m.parent_id,m.path,m.perms,m.component,m.type,m.icon,m.orderNum,m.create_time, m.update_time,m.`status` ,mt.level + 1 FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN menu_tree mt ON m.parent_id = mt.id ) SELECT id, name, parent_id,path,perms,component,type,icon,orderNum,create_time, update_time,`status`,level FROM menu_tree;
